publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5463 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Rule 10.6.5â€”That the Parliament agrees that, for the purpose of allowing up to 30 minutes to debate motion S2M-5454 in relation to the draft Local Government Elections Order 2007 on Thursday 25 January 2007, the second and third sentences of Rule 10.6.5 of Standing Orders be suspended. Supported by: George Lyon*
